Service Details: Provides group training sessions and weekly in-home coaching support for parents with children under the age of 2 to learn new skills for nurturing and healthy communication
Eligibility: Parents with children to 2 years of age
How to Apply: Referrals:  from yourself, other community agencies, Public Health or the Ministry of Children and Family Development
Address & Map: 1390 KLO RdKelowna, BC     V1W 3P6View MapQuest Map
